content.raw: ignition-cmake 0.x or 1.x series are designed to coexist with the ignition-cmake 2.x , as far as I can tell. You might hit a corner case problem of using both at the same time, we can help investigating it \(please fill an issue in ignition-cmake tracker\). I’m afraid that updating ign-transport5 to use a different ign-cmake is not an option right now.
content.html: ignition-cmake 0.x or 1.x series are designed to coexist with the ignition-cmake 2.x , as far as I can tell. You might hit a corner case problem of using both at the same time, we can help investigating it (please fill an issue in ignition-cmake tracker). I’m afraid that updating ign-transport5 to use a different ign-cmake is not an option right now.
